Title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Overview: A group of scientists in San Francisco struggle to stay alive in the aftermath of a plague that is wiping out humanity, while Caesar tries to maintain dominance over his community of intelligent apes.
Keywords: leader, colony, post-apocalyptic, dystopia, forest, sequel, woods, ape, scientist, monkey, medical research, animal attack, plague, 3d
production_companies: Ingenious Media, Chernin Entertainment, TSG Entertainment
Cast: Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman
